subject: Free Dyson Animal Vacuum Cleaner.
body:
Clean up with a Dyson. Animal Vacuum. The most powerful upright.
Get a complimentary Dyson. Animal Vacuum and remove pet hair
from confined spaces such as upholstery, stairs and the car.
